Don't Get Comfortable Lecture Series

Don't Get Comfortable is a hypothetical jazz lecture series I created for my corporate publications course during my senior year of college. For the lectures, a created a series of postcards advertising the five lectures, each honoring a different musician.

  • Art Direction
  • Branding
  • Book Design
2011

↑ Each musician was assigned a color pulled from post cards and throughout the book, each musician is represented by that color, providing a series of monotone sections.

↑
